contents.text: Thank you for calling Hustle in San Francisco, where we help drive action through peer-to-peer texting.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To schedule a personalized demo of our texting platform, press 1.
Please stay on the line while we connect you to our demo scheduling team.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a personalized demo of your peer-to-peer texting platform.
Schedule a personalized demo of the platform to plan a veteran outreach texting campaign.
Schedule a technical demo of the peer-to-peer texting platform to review API integration and feature set.
I need to set up a personal demo so someone can walk me through the texting platform.
Schedule a demo to see how Hustle can help recruit research participants via peer-to-peer texting.

contents.text: To talk to a sales representative about pricing and plans, press 2.
Please hold and we’ll connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with someone about your pricing tiers and plan options.
Talk to a sales representative about pricing and plans suitable for a veteran support initiative.
Discuss pricing tiers and plan details for the texting service to calculate cost per message and scalability.
I want to talk to someone about pricing and subscription plans.
Discuss pricing plans and student discounts for using the texting platform in my research project.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
One moment please while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I’m having an error sending messages and need help troubleshooting the platform.
Get technical assistance troubleshooting issues sending group texts through the platform.
Troubleshoot API webhook failures in my peer-to-peer texting integration and get technical support.
I’m having trouble with the platform and need technical troubleshooting help.
Troubleshoot an authentication error when integrating Hustle’s API with my survey script.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I’d like to review my latest invoice and clarify a charge on my account.
Inquire about recent billing charges on my account.
Clarify unexpected billing charges and review usage metrics on my account invoice.
I have questions about my bill and need help with my account charges.
Clarify my upcoming invoice date and update my billing information.
